mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.NOTI_ID, A.LICNS_CD, A.LICNS_NM, A.LICNS_CTGY_NM, A.LICNS_GROUP, A.LICNS_DSTNCT_CD, (SELECT COMN_CD_NM FROM COMN_CODE WHERE COMN_CD_GROUP_ID = 'LICNS_DSTNCT_CD' AND COMN_CD = A.LICNS_DSTNCT_CD) AS LICNS_DSTNCT_CD_NM FROM NOTI_LICNS A WHERE A.NOTI_ID = #{notiId} AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.LICNS_DSTNCT_CD ASC, A.LICNS_CTGY_NM ASC
